markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Web Walker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2766) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have plenty of practice navigating webs. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves and AC against the [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) spell, natural webbing, and effects that entrap you in webbing, as well as a +1 circumstance bonus against other effects that snare and entangle you, like the [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103) spell. Whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an effect involving a web, you get a critical success instead.
name: Web Walker

summary_markdown: You have plenty of practice navigating webs.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Web Walker Source The Mwangi Expanse pg. 103 2.0 --- You have plenty of practice navigating webs. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves and AC against the web spell, natural webbing, and effects that entrap you in webbing, as well as a +1 circumstance bonus against other effects that snare and entangle you, like the entangle spell. Whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an effect involving a web, you get a critical success instead.
